short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to block JavaScript bookmarks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension to automatically poll and delete bookmarks that are added that contain Javascript which are commonly used for Discord scams ( see https://krebsonsecurity.com/2023/05/discord-admins-hacked-by-malicious-bookmarks/ for more info).
